comment: Nice expirience except for just one problem with the repost button, I've had the app for a few months and i just cannot find the repost button, deleting and redownloading solves this for about 10 minutes but it will dissapear again.
scenarios: Unable to find the repost button even after having the app for a few months.
Reinstalling the app solves the issue with the repost button for about 10 minutes, but then it disappears again.
key sentence: Unable to find the repost button even after having the app for a few months.
the function of activity: This activity involves various tasks such as searching for contacts, playing, pausing, liking, sharing, and reporting videos, as well as managing user profiles and interactions(following list, follower, like,favorites,private,draft).
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Report', 'description': 'Report the video'}, {'name': 'Not interested', 'description': 'Indicate disinterest in the video'}, {'name': 'Save video', 'description': 'Save the video to the device'}, {'name': 'Captions', 'description': 'Toggle captions on/off'}, {'name': 'Clear display', 'description': 'Clear the display'}, {'name': 'Playback speed', 'description': 'Adjust the playback speed'}, {'name': 'Share with', 'description': 'Share the video with others'}, {'name': 'Repost', 'description': 'Repost the video'}, {'name': 'Add to Story', 'description': 'Add the video to your story'}, {'name': 'Send', 'description': 'Send the video to a friend'}, {'name': 'More friends', 'description': 'View more friends to send the video to'}]
